sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A briefe description of the reasons that make the declaration of the ban made against the King of Bohemia, as being Elector Palatine, dated the 22. of Ianuarie last past, of no value nor worth, and therefore not to be respected
[2], 13, [1] p.
By Arnold Meuris bookeseller at the signe of the Bible [i.e. by E. Allde for T. Archer?], Printed at the Hayf [sic, i.e. London] : 1621.
The imprint is false. Actual place of publication and suggested printer and publisher from STC. On 13 August 1621 Allde and Archer were ordered to be imprisoned for printing this--STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[2], 13, [1] p.
By Arnold Meuris bookeseller at the signe of the Bible [i.e. by E. Allde for T. Archer?], Printed at the Hayf [sic, i.e. London] : 1621.
The imprint is false. Actual place of publication and suggested printer and publisher from STC. On 13 August 1621 Allde and Archer were ordered to be imprisoned for printing this--STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
